nydailynews.title: N.J. teacher had sex with 6 students ages 14, 15: prosecutor
nydailynews.topComment: I am sorry, I hate to be "that guy" who always argues for the "rights of men" but could you imagine this situation where an adult male teacher had sex/oral sex with 6 female students and his defense attorneys blamed/labeled the victims as the "aggres...
